Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_QUICK_TYPE

The basic type MILES_QUICK_TYPE describes the data in a Quick API audio handle.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 AIL_QUICK_XMIDI_TYPE Audio handle contains MIDI or XMIDI data. (Debugger value: 1).
 AIL_QUICK_DLS_XMIDI_TYPE Audio handle contains MIDI or XMIDI data with embedded DLS data. (Debugger value: 3).
 AIL_QUICK_DIGITAL_TYPE Audio handle contains digital sound data. (Debugger value: 2).
 AIL_QUICK_MPEG_DIGITAL_TYPE Audio handle contains MPEG digital sound data. (Debugger value: 4).


Group: Quick Integration Services
Related Functions: AIL_quick_type
